content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must admit, I'm a bit of a tough negotiator. Let's see how this goes. I'm looking for at least 2000 Euros per month. Remember, we're only discussing the rental price here, not any additional costs or terms.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, Yi-Nuo Wang, I respect your decision. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the rental price you find excessive is actually a fair one considering the apartment's location and features.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
